participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, enjoys building things and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: I grew up in the Midwest, but now I live and work remotely from home in a small town in the mountains. I remember my first purchase of a pickle jar. I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture. I play guitar in my free time. I like Katy Perry as a musician.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and artistic, loves storytelling through film and has a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: I have a student id and hate paying my bills. I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others. I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars. I love making short films with my camcorder. I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.

content.text: Hey, I see you're a student. What are you studying?
Oh, I'm studying film at the moment. I'm really into it.
That's cool. I've always wanted to make a short film.
You should! It's a lot of fun. Do you have any ideas for a story?
Not really, no. I'm not very creative.
Well, that's okay. You could always just make a documentary about something you're passionate about.
That's actually a really good idea. I could make a documentary about my love of comic books.
That would be awesome! I love comic books too.
Maybe we could collaborate on it.
That would be so much fun! We could make it a cross-genre film.
That would be amazing! I'm so excited to get started.
Me too! This is going to be so much fun.
